page.title: 12Churches Maresfield Area
page.content: {St. Bartholomews}is in the middle of Maresfield.Its surrounded by a grave yard with a lych gate entrance. The church has several beautiful stained glass windows.Theres a notice on wall listing service times.The church has a tower with battlements. The font from what was once St.Marys chapel Nutley is preserved in St.Bartholomews.The church has six bells dating back to 1787.In the year 1879 the church was re-opened by the Bishop of Chichester. { The Independent church}is a small church in Five Ash Down.The church was 201 years old on the 12th of June 1985.It has a Sunday school next door in a separate building.The grave yard is all overgrown.There is a notice in the middle of the grave-yard listing the services.by Elizabeth and Lauren.
